text: A Song for You () is a 1933 German musical comedy film directed by Joe May and starring Jan Kiepura, Jenny Jugo and Paul Kemp.Bock & Bergfelder, p. 228 It was remade in Britain the following year as My Song for You. The film's art direction was by Werner Schlichting. It was shot at the Babelsberg Studios and on location in Naples and Vienna. ==Cast== ==See also== * All for Love (1933 film) (Tout pour l'amour, French-language film, 1933) * My Song for You (film) (English-language film, 1934) == References == Notes Bibliography * == External links == * Category:1933 films Category:German films Category:Films of the Weimar Republic Category:German musical comedy films Category:1933 musical comedy films Category:German-language films Category:Films directed by Joe May Category:UFA films Category:Operetta films Category:German multilingual films Category:Films set in Vienna Category:Films set in Naples Category:Films scored by Bronisław Kaper Category:Cine-Allianz films Category:German black-and-white films Category:Films shot at Babelsberg Studios Category:1933 multilingual films Category:1933 comedy films
title: A Song for You (film)
